mapper.update: INSERT ALL INTO post(post_num, community_category_num, post_title, post_content, post_reg_id, post_reg_date, post_update_date, post_hit_count, post_visible, post_gather) VALUES (#{post_num}, 5, #{post_title}, #{post_content}, #{post_reg_id}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 0, 1, 1) INTO post_file (file_num, post_num, saveFilename, originalFilename) VALUES (#{file_num}, #{post_num}, #{saveFilename}, #{originalFilename}) SELECT * FROM dual
UPDATE post SET post_title=#{post_title}, post_content=#{post_content} WHERE post_num = #{post_num}
mapper.select:
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM post p JOIN user1 u ON p.post_reg_id = u.useridx
AND community_category_num = 5

SELECT p.post_num, p.post_reg_id, user_name, post_title, post_hit_count, post_content, TO_CHAR(post_reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as post_reg_date, NVL(f.post_fileCount, 0) as post_fileCount, NVL(c.replyCount, 0) as replyCount, f.originalFilename FROM post p JOIN user1 m ON p.post_reg_id = m.useridx LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT post_num, COUNT(*) as post_fileCount, MAX(file_num) as file_num, MAX(originalFilename) KEEP (DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY file_num) as originalFilename FROM post_file GROUP BY post_num ) f ON p.post_num = f.post_num LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT post_num, COUNT(*) as replyCount FROM reply WHERE reply_visible = 1 GROUP BY post_num ) c ON p.post_num = c.post_num
AND community_category_num = 5
ORDER BY p.post_num DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT p.post_num, p.post_reg_id, user_name, post_title, post_hit_count, post_content, TO_CHAR(post_reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as post_reg_date, originalFilename, saveFilename, NVL(boardLikeCount, 0) boardLikeCount FROM post p JOIN post_file fp ON p.post_num = fp.post_num JOIN user1 u ON p.post_reg_id = u.useridx LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT post_num, COUNT(*) boardLikeCount FROM post_like GROUP BY post_num ) pl ON p.post_num = pl.post_num WHERE p.post_num = #{post_num}
